page.title: 13MARKET RASEN- LEISURE
page.content: The town offers a variety of pursuits for leisure time. For the energetic there are a number of footpaths which lead to the beautiful countryside close to the town. The Willingham Woods picnic area gives the chance to walk through the pine trees or enjoy the open grass area(2 miles from town centre).The Adult Education service organises a variety of classes at the 2 main schools in the evening catering for most tastes. There are many flourishing organisations including W.I.,Round Table,Rotary,Freemasons, Probus and Flower-Arranging.The political parties also are represented there being Liberal, Labour, STP and Conservative Associations. The Chamber or Trade is also active.The Xmas Tree Committee keeps its anonimity,each year providing gifts for Father Xmas to give to the town's young children.
